refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A surname is an inherited or family name; in Western cultures, the last name. This is used for the patronymic or matronymic name or any name that is based on a person's situation at birth or due to marriage or adoption.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: In an address, this element may inherit the verbatim qualities of an address.
